title: Paul Hines Search - Old Judge / Buchner Gold Coin
author: BaseballChuck

posts.post_title: Paul Hines Search - Old Judge / Buchner Gold Coin
posts.post_content:
Hello friends, I am searching for a Paul Hines card from either Old Judge or Buchner Gold Coin. I am putting together a personal set of all of the Triple Crown winners in history. Here are a few photos of what they look like. If anyone has one available or knows of one, please do reach out. I would appreciate the help.

Thanks and be well.
